Description: ***PLEASE READ BEFORE BIDDING*** Your complete satisfaction is of utmost importance, and we strive to offer the very best buying experience possible. If on the remote chance there is a problem, please contact us before leaving feedback and we will be more than willing to work with you to resolve it. We hope you are pleased with your purchase and will come back again! We are a pawn shop, not a music store, and so have limited knowledge of guitars. We describe and check every instrument as thoroughly as we can. Customer satisfaction is our main concern, so please contact us immediately if there are any problems. Description Absolutely beautiful preowned Charvel desolation DS-2 ST electric guitar offered in sunburst cherry. Comes with a hard case made by Gibson USA. All mahogany body, compound radius neck and active humbuckers. The Desolation DS-2 ST has been upgraded with new multi-ply neck and body binding, new metallic keystone fingerboard inlays and stylish satin-chrome hardware. Continuing premium features include a carved-top single-cutaway mahogany body, mahogany set neck with scalloped heel, compound radius (12-16) rosewood fingerboard with 24 jumbo frets, dual Charvel active humbucking pickups with three-way toggle switching, Charvel bridge specially designed for compound-radius fingerboards, three-on-a-side Charvel tuners, and solid and trans finishes (flame maple veneer on trans finishes). FEATURES Body Body shape: Single cutaway Body type: Solid body Body material: Solid wood Top wood: Not applicable Body wood: Mahogany Body finish: Gloss Orientation: Right handed Neck Neck shape: Original Charvel Neck wood: Mahogany Joint: Set-in Scale length: 25.5" Truss rod: Standard Neck finish: Oiled Fretboard Material: Rosewood Radius: Compound Fret size: Jumbo Number of frets: 24 Inlays: Alumiloid keystone Nut width: 1.65" (42mm) Pickups Configuration: HH Neck: Active Desolation humbucking Middle: Not applicable Bridge: Active Desolation humbucking Brand: Charvel Active or passive: Active Series or parallel: Series Piezo: No Active EQ: No Special electronics: None Controls Control layout: Volume 1, volume 2, tone 1, tone 2 Pickup switch: 3-way Coil tap or split: No Kill switch: No Hardware Bridge type: Fixed Bridge design: Compound radius compensated Tailpiece: Stopbar Tuning machines: Die-cast Color: Nickel/chrome Other Number of strings: 6-string Special features: Body finish Case: Sold separately Accessories: None Country of origin: China Good luck and happy bidding!!!
Title: Charvel Desolation DS-2 ST Single Cutaway/ Electric Guitar (Excellent)
